title: Help me please!
body: I created a new account but it's in EU West but I live in north america so I can't run the game as well how do I change my accounts region? :/

replies.body:
Heya
Changing your Region cost Riotpoints(wich you get for real world money). Considering that this is a new account i would recommend creating a new one in NA. You can take the same Name as long as the Name is not taken on NA.
Make sure to select North America as your region when you do though :P

Regards Rkoturdo

To follow up on Rkoturdo Ndo's comment, you can sign up specifically for an account on the NA region using [this link here.](https://signup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/index?realm_key=na)

Let me know if you run into any issues.
